body:
mmk so i was thinking: Well, this prestige thing is cool, but i dont really see a point to it, other than you get your name on the top 10.. So i was thinking, what if we gave people more motivation to play other than a sticker by your name saying you did it. how about We give out special rewards to people who achieve a certain prestige, and you claim it at the end of the season. Yes you are probably thinking mi copying Hypickle, but really, thats like blaming someone for wearing pants bc you wore them first. The following below is a chart, of which I think could be typical and good Prestige exclusives.


Comment what effects, cries and other cool stuff could go under these categories. 

Kill effects
-
-
Mon break effects
-
-
Wool placement effects
-
-
Win celebrations
-
-
Game start war cries
-
-
Also, comment other ideas of Prestige exclusives.
EDIT: 
I think the rewards should be given out to people who get a certain prestige, not a specefuc place Example:
Prestige one - Kill sound
Prestige two - kill effect
ETC

from rattLe

title: Prestige Rewards?!?!?

replies.body:
+1 

1st place in seasons should get 5k Credits, an iron golem morph, exclusive kill sound and an exclusive trail which no-one else can get
2nd place in seasons should get 3k Credits, an exclusive kill sound and iron golem morph maybe?
3rd place in seasons should get 2k Credits, an exclusive kill sound and the 2nd most expensive morph?
4th place in seasons 1k Credits & exclusive kill sound?
5th place in seasons 500 Credits & exclusive kill sound?

replies.body: Diamond, Platinum, Gold, Silver and bronze badge, ez
replies.body_tagged: Diamond, Platinum, Gold, Silver and bronze badge, ez

replies.body: Sounds good but glhf getting it implemented.
replies.body_tagged: Sounds good but glhf getting it implemented.

replies.body: I like the idea, so is it gonna be like Hypixel when every time you level up, you get a new reward?
replies.body_tagged: I like the idea, so is it gonna be like Hypixel when every time you level up, you get a new reward?

replies.body:
Yes and no. Hypixel leveling rewards do not contain anything other than MVP+ badges and coins and xp, nothing ingame. But in Hypixel Ranked rewards, thats where you get blood effects and stuff.

This is alike hypixel very much; the season ends, and people claim their rewards, which can only be claimed by leveling
